text: “Ne okhuhandichile amalayi khushialo khuno, nende mutsuli mwikulu. Efwe khukhukalushila; Nyasaye naboola mbu: “Eshinyasio shianje ndalahelesia owandenya, ne tsimbabaasi tsianje tsiaswana buli eshindu; nditsa okhutsiandichila balia baritsanga akandakaana, nende barusinjia eshihanwa, nende basuubilanga tsinyali tsiefu
